doc.previous: On 11 June 2012, Sri Lankan Airlines was announced as Oneworld's latest member-elect, on the sidelines of the IATA World Air Transport Summit in Beijing. Cathay Pacific served Sri Lankan Airlines as its sponsor through its alliance implementation programme. Its membership implementation took approximately 18 months. On 1 May 2014, Sri Lankan Airlines became a full-member of the alliance, making it the first airline in the Indian subcontinent to join any airline alliance.
